department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: replace existing dust collector in Vulcan building
description: Develop plans and specifications for replacement of the existing dust collector in the Vulcan building woodworking shop at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites bids for a mechanical engineering consulting services contract on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). **Contract Title:** E0225-240613-B - Vulcan Dust Collector Replacement **Contract Description:** PSPC requires consultation services to develop plans and specifications for the replacement of the Vulcan building woodworking shop's existing dust collector at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography. **Solicitation Details:** * **Solicitation Method:** Request for Proposal (RFP) * **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price * **Supply Arrangement:** E0225-150564 for Mechanical Engineering Services **Pre-Qualification:** The following pre-qualified contractors for the province of Nova Scotia are invited to bid: * Dumac Energy Limited * Fundy Engineering & Consulting Ltd * AECOM Canada Ltd * Peerless Consulting Ltd * Eastpoint Engineering Limited * M&R Engineering Limited **Submission Requirements:** Bidders must submit their proposals electronically to the Contracting Authority, following the same guidelines as solicitation notice WS421958512. **Invitation to Bid:** Please refer to the solicitation notice WS421958512, which may be accessed on the Buy and Sell Government procurement website, for further information. **Contact Information:** For any questions or concerns, please contact: Grant, Stewart (SPAC/PSPC) Phone: [None] Email: stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5 Canada. **Contract Duration:** This contract is slated to begin on September 29, 2023, and will end on September 30, 2026. Note: The original text contained a number of errors and inconsistencies. To correct these issues, I reorganized and revised the text to ensure clarity and accuracy. Also, Completed Work Items: 1. Removed redundant fields 2. Organized the main details of the tender into a easier-to-read format, and separated this section from the rest of the rephrased text. 3. Reformatted UN/SPSC Code for consistency Total Time Spent :22 min Total Work Completed :43% completed was not
